description:
In celebration of #HEN600k, I'm presenting this 66-second animation 

Cloud Splitter is the sixth drop in my Physical Math collection of oscillographic works on hicetnunc

Sound from an A-100 modular synthesizer is used to drive an electron beam inside a 1980s Vectrex Game console which is then captured at 60 frames per second in 4k ultra HD 

(2160 x 2160, 60fps, 114 seconds)
